summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 4-5, 2019. It includes inmate count sheets, rosters, and out-count forms, which are routine prison headcount and assignment logs. The significance is that these are the standard operational records from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held at the time of his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as inmate #76318-054 on an inmate roster with an assignment to unit Z04-206LAD, indicating he was housed in a special housing unit (SHU).

persons.name: Weber
persons.context: Listed on an inmate roster with an assignment to HOSP (hospital) and a note 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG', suggesting a suicide watch or unassigned status.

persons.name: Thomas
persons.context: Appears twice on out-count forms (register numbers 79965-054 and 79652-054), listed as being in unit KS.

persons.name: Bang
persons.context: Listed on out-count forms and an inmate roster (register #77863-112), assigned to unit KS and later to K12-062U for 'FS PM' (likely Food Service PM shift).

persons.name: Granados
persons.context: Listed on out-count forms (register #76161-054) in unit KS, and on a roster as Granados-Corona assigned to K07-007L for FS PM.

persons.name: Duncan
persons.context: Listed on out-count forms (register #86764-054) in unit KS, and on a roster assigned to K12-065U for FS PM with a note 'SUICIDE OR'.

persons.name: Estrada
persons.context: Listed on out-count forms (register #51702-069) in unit KS, and on a roster as Estrada-Rodriguez assigned to K09-0250 for FS PM.

persons.name: Merchant
persons.context: Listed on out-count forms (register #86026-054) in unit KS, and on a roster assigned to K12-061L for PS PM.

persons.name: Reingold
persons.context: Listed on out-count forms as 'Remgold' (register #86022-054) in unit KS, and on a roster as 'Reingoud' assigned to K12-0780 for PS PM.

persons.name: Martinez
persons.context: Listed on out-count forms as 'Martin&' (likely Martinez, register #85976-054) in unit KS, and on a roster as 'Martinez' assigned to K09-027U for FS PM.

persons.name: Kamara
persons.context: Listed on out-count forms (register #86535-054) in unit KS, and on a roster assigned to K11-0530 for FS PM.

persons.name: Romero
persons.context: Appears multiple times. On out-count forms: Romero (register #85927-054) in KS, and Romero (register #78841-054) in IN. On rosters: Romero (78841-054) in unit 9NFS, and Romero-Granados (85927-054) assigned to K10-045U for FS PM.

persons.name: Medina
persons.context: Listed on out-count forms (register #79339-054) in unit IN, and on a roster assigned to I03-924L in 'UNIT 9NFS'.

persons.name: Araujo
persons.context: Listed on an inmate roster (register #91126-053) with an ATTY (attorney visit) assignment to 104-930U, status UNASSG.

persons.name: Diaz-Moralez
persons.context: Listed on an inmate roster (register #76156-054) with an ATTY (attorney visit) assignment to K09-030U, status UNASSG.

events.title: Daily Prison Counts and Assignments
events.description: Routine administrative headcounts and assignment logs were conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York. These include census counts, out-counts for inmates away from their units, and inmate rosters detailing housing and work assignments.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is listed as inmate #76318-054 on an inmate roster dated August 4, 2019, with a housing assignment to 'Z04-206LAD' and status 'UNASSG'.
The documents are standard Bureau of Prisons administrative forms (count sheets, rosters, out-count forms) showing the routine operation of the MCC New York facility.
Another inmate, 'Weber', is listed on a roster with an assignment to 'HOSP' and a note 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG', indicating a possible suicide watch protocol.
Multiple inmates are listed with assignments to 'FS PM' (Food Service PM shift) or 'PS PM', and some have notes like 'SUICIDE OR', suggesting monitoring for at-risk individuals.
The documents provide a snapshot of the prison population and logistics on and around August 4, 2019, which is shortly before Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
